title: Smokeheads
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: Adam had only ever been to his house a few times, a secluded sprawl of old buildings along a farm track outside Pencaitland. Luke had bought the place, gutted it and transformed it into a studio, using the insurance money he received when his mum and dad died.

title: The Story of My Life, volumes 4-6
author: Hare, Augustus J. C. (Augustus John Cuthbert)
